# PHPickerMode

**Structure**

Layout options that determine how the picker orders photos visually.

## Declaration

```swift
struct PHPickerMode
```

## Overview

This structure defines the possible options for the photos picker configuration ([doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHPickerConfiguration-c.class]) property [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHPickerConfiguration-swift.struct/mode]. The option you choose determines the direction that its assets scroll in the view. In addition, the linear scrolling behavior of [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHPickerMode-swift.struct/compact] mode offers the best user experience in a space-constrained layout.

## Laying out photos

- **compact**: A linear layout that’s conducive to a smaller area onscreen.
- **default**: A grid-based layout that’s conducive to a larger area onscreen.

## Customizing picker appearance and behavior

- **mode**: A layout type for the photos in the picker’s view.
- **disabledCapabilities**: The aspects of a photo picker’s default appearance that your app can disable.
- **PHPickerCapabilities**: Options that customize the look and behavior of the photos picker.
- **edgesWithoutContentMargins**: The portions of a photo picker’s perimeter that are borderless.
- **PHPickerConfiguration.Update**: An object that defines the aspects of a photo picker’s appearance that can change while it’s presented.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
